      static User findResponsibleUserForShift(int shiftId)
      finds a responsible employee for a shift, prefers nurses, then health_workers, then assistants

      sends notification to admin about new responsibe employee on shift
      static boolean updateNotification(int feedId, boolean shiftAccepted)
      updates news feed notification given by ID, according to which news feed category the news feed item is.

      • sendNewResponsibleChangeNotification

        public static boolean sendNewResponsibleChangeNotification(int userId,
                                                           int shiftId)
        sends notification to admin about new responsibe employee on shift
        Parameters:
        userId - - the ID of the employee who set as responsible
        shiftId - - the ID of the shift
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • updateNotification

        public static boolean updateNotification(int feedId,
                                         boolean shiftAccepted)
        updates news feed notification given by ID, according to which news feed category the news feed item is.
        Parameters:
        feedId - - the ID of the news feed notification to be updated
        shiftAccepted - - boolean used by cases where something is to be accepted or declined, default true if not applicable
        Returns:
        True if successful

      • findResponsibleUserForShift

        public static User findResponsibleUserForShift(int shiftId)
        finds a responsible employee for a shift, prefers nurses, then health_workers, then assistants
        Parameters:
        shiftId - - the shift that needs a new employee responsible
        Returns:
        User obj for the new responsible employee
